description: After a day of sun, reenergize your skin with this cooling lotion. It hydrates and soothes your skin with aloe and vitamin E.Non-greasy formula leaves skin smooth and soft.hypoallergenic, oxybenzone free & octinoxate free, cruelty free, vegan, paraben free, gluten free and propylene glycol free.
name: Sun Bum After Sun Cool Down Lotion 177ml
